From the comments in #5198 (comment), it looks like TensorFlow calls it matrix_diag, so if we are adding a new function, it might be good to stick with a similar name.

Can we add a parameter to diagflat to specify which dimensions to flatten (and by default flatten all of them)? This way, the other dimensions can be considered as batch dimensions.

body:
From the comments in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5198#issuecomment-425069863, it looks like TensorFlow calls it `matrix_diag`, so if we are adding a new function, it might be good to stick with a similar name.

Can we add a parameter to `diagflat` to specify which dimensions to flatten (and by default flatten all of them)? This way, the other dimensions can be considered as batch dimensions.
